summary: Low air pollution forecast valid from Saturday 4 December to end of Saturday 4 December GMT
description: Saturday will be another chilly day, overcast with a moderate breeze. <br/><br/>The continuing Atlantic breeze will ensure good dispersion of locally emissions.  Air pollution will remain 'Low' throughout the forecast period for the following pollutants:<br/><br/>Nitrogen Dioxide<br/>Ozone<br/>Sulphur Dioxide <br/>PM10 Particulates<br/>PM2.5 Particulates
disclaimerText: This is for learning purpose and does not reflect real data source. See https://next.github.com/projects/flat-data for Flat Data Info
